body.name: Apple Magic Mouse: Wireless, Bluetooth, Rechargeable. Works with Mac or iPad; Multi-Touch Surface - White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
features: WIRELESS, RECHARGEABLE CONVENIENCE — Magic Mouse connects wirelessly to your device via Bluetooth. And the rechargeable internal battery means no loose batteries to replace.
WORKS WITH MAC OR IPAD — It’s ready to go right out of the box and pairs quickly with your Mac or iPad so you can get to work right away.

SWIPE AND SCROLL ON THE MULTI-TOUCH SURFACE — The Multi-Touch surface allows you to perform simple gestures such as swiping and scrolling. And an optimized foot design lets Magic Mouse glide smoothly across your desk.

GO WEEKS WITHOUT CHARGING — The incredibly long-lasting internal battery will power your Magic Mouse for about a month or more between charges. Comes with a woven USB-C to Lightning Cable that lets you pair and charge by connecting to a USB-C port on your Mac or iPad.
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS — Requires a Bluetooth-enabled Mac with OS X 10.11 or later or an iPad with iPadOS 13.4 or later.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Wireless, Portable, Lightweight, Touch Scroll, Rechargeable

productInformation.name: System Requirements
productInformation.value: Bluetooth-enabled Mac with OS X 10.11 or later , iPad with iPadOS 13.4 or later

productInformation.name: What’s in the Box
productInformation.value: Magic Mouse, USB-C to Lightning Cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Investment For Office And Digital Use
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this mouse, it feels so good and different when using it. It works so smooth compared to other mouses I have had in the past. Price might be a bit steep for a mouse; however, it is worth it due to its long battery life and great experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: I paused at the price but this mouse is terrific. Great Apple design, sleek and compact, and best of all it holds its charge a very long time. Setings allow for great functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mouse for your Mac!
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play, works great! Great alternative when my pad quit working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars -it just works- is more than a meme.
reviews.reviewText: The thing is flawless, absolutely better than the trackpad. Hardware or external, does everything the trackpad does save for opening launchpad, but needing a gesture for that is a bit superfluous in my opinion. You can effortlessly gesture between tabs, programs, scrolling - works on every surface as well. If you’re having any issues without a mousepad you can simply adjust its settings - the thing is absolutely worth the price. And a far better option than the more expensive trackpad imo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gestures make this mouse worth it.
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse. Apple puts form over function in the design, but then they make up for it. It's small and sleek and clicky with just the right amount of weight. The charger port is hidden on the bottom where you can't charge and use the mouse at the same time, but I got over it. It's a trade-off for a flatter mouse, and I charged this mouse fully a couple weeks ago and I'm still at 75%. That's another plus - the last cheap mouse I had went to sleep all the time, took too long to reconnect and would be surprise me by dying at the most in-opportune time. This one connects quickly and easily and reports its battery percentage. Instead of 4 tiny cheap rubber dots, this mouse glides smoothly on two thick rails.The winning feature is gestures. No scroll wheel, just swipes. 2 fingers swiped left or right will switch between full screen apps, and tapping lightly with 2 fingers brings up Mission Control showing all my windows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetically pleasing mouse
reviews.reviewText: It looks very good but honestly its not the most comfortable mouse out there, if you like the apple environment its okay but if you're trying to get a nice grip I would recommend other brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny Device, Big Power
reviews.reviewText: Since I’ve purchased this Magic Mouse, in November I haven't had to charge it once. It works really well, very sensitive. I recommended getting a good and stable mouse pad because it doesn’t work well without it (in my experience). But it’s definitely legit. If your like me and dislikes the scrolling on the MacBook, you definitely should get this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for Mac Users
reviews.reviewText: So, this is great for Macs obviously, but I prefer the feel of an LG G series mouse to this. What I like about the magic mouse is the quality and capabilities. The battery life is really good and you could probably go over a month between charges if you’re using it every day. One inconvenience though is that you cannot charge this and use it at the same time, so be sure not to let it get too low.The capabilities of this mouse are really good. You have some gesture options you can select from as the surface is a touch surface. One feature I like is the “right click” setting where the mouse can sense and perform a right click response like you would on a standard mouse. The scroll and window switch gestures available are also convenient. The shape, weight, glide resistance, and cursor speed takes some getting used to depending on what you’re preferences are, but overall great product.

This replaces my old battery operated Magic Mouse - quick and easy to pair and set up snd works perfectly. Fast recharge time and I use the old mouse if I need to use the computer in the recharge downtime. This is a superior product and well worth the premium price. Highly recommended.
Práctico y hasta ahora sigue funcionando buena comora

reviews.reviewTitle: Black or White they perform the same why the diff in price?
reviews.reviewText: Works very well and the battery last for ever
Fora o design esse mouse é ótimo para uso do Mac

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 22, 2023
